ResearchProjectDef.label: Adorable Doodles
ResearchProjectDef.description: At first glance it's just a few nice drawings someone's misplaced, but in actuality it's a bunch of lovely well-made designs to spruce up the place ! Wonder who left them here~?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cable Management
ResearchProjectDef.description: A random sticky note found stuck on one of the research papers ? Its a simple note reminding us to do something about those ugly power conduits and some tips on ways to fix that !
